name: Ni WooCommerce Sales Report By User Role
author: anzia

sections.description:
Ni WooCommerce Sales Report By User Role Description

Ni WooCommerce Sales Report by User Role provide the flexibility to check the sales report base on the sales person or sales agent. This plugin help to find the sales person or sales agent contribution on sales.

Ni WooCommerce Sales Report by User Role provide the sales analysis report base on the user role. This report provide the ability to assign the sales agent with order and provide the sales analysis report base on the selected sales agent.

This report also provide the option to filter the report base on the sales agent sales and order period like today sales, yesterday sales and this month sales.

We have provide the flexibility option to select your role for sales agent or select Ni Sales Agent for new role. Create the new sales agent base on selected role and assign that sales agent in order.

Key Features of WooCommerce Sales Report By User Role

  • Dashboard – Show the sales analysis on dashboard like today sales, this month, this year and total sales.
  • Show the top 10 recent order list on dashboard.
  • Search by date, Today Date, Yesterday Date, Last 7 days, Last 30 days, This year.
  • Sales order report.
  • Sales Agent Report.
  • Setting option to set the user role for report.
  • Display the user list in order base on the selected role in settings.

Note: This plugin is fully compatible with both WooCommerce’s new High-Performance Order Storage (HPOS) and the legacy WordPress posts storage. Whether you are utilizing HPOS or the traditional storage method, you can rely on this plugin to work seamlessly with your current setup.

for more features buy our pro version

  • View Demo Ni WooCommerce Sales Agent and Sales Commission
  • Buy Now Ni WooCommerce Sales Agent and Sales Commission

Disclaimer

It is not responsible for any harm or wrong doing this Plugin may cause. Users are fully responsible for their own use. This Plugin is to be used WITHOUT warranty.
sections.installation:
1. Use the WordPress plugin installer or upload files to WordPress plugin directory.
  2. Activate plugin from admin panel.
  3. Find the menu User Role Report.
  4. Go to setting and select the existing user role or select the Ni Sales Agent for new user role.
  5. Go to user add new user and select the setting role or Ni Sales Agent role.
  6. Edit the order and find select sales agnet dropdown and select user.
  7. Go to sales order list and enjoy the plugin.
sections.faq:
Where i can get help?

Click on support tab or email:support@naziinfotech.com

Do you customize this plugin?

Yes, as per requirement we can customize this plugin.
